title: Riot points Card
body: Hay, so i came to the UK and got a riot points card. but my account is on american serversT-T. And i didnt know that a card that i buy in a different region wont work on another region account. so if anyone has a american $25 card plz help me out if u have a eu account. i have a 18 pound card for 3500 riot points. and i would like to switch cards. ill send u my code and u send me yours. plz someone be kind inuf to help.thx.

replies.body:
Rather than complete a transaction outside of the store, which is not recommended, I suggest reaching out to our billing specialists about this. If you [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), I'm confident one of our team members can work with you on a solution. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
What number do I call? American or EU? And Wat is the number? Thx for the help.

We don't have a number you can call, but you can reach out to our billing team via our support page below:

[Click Here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any other questions or need assistance submitting a ticket.
Hay it says it was solved but that's all. What do I do now this is so confusing. It didn't even help.

I took a look at your ticket and it looks like an error on our end solved it out accidentally, sorry about that! I've spoken to the team and you should have a reply to your request soon. 

Let me know if you encounter any other issues.
someone hack my account MonsterRiper is there anything I or riot can do about that. He is also trying to scam the people that are my friends

As *Deep Terror Nami* mentioned in [your post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/u5vm2r1b-is-there-any-way-i-can-have-my-old-account-monsterriper-erased) about this issue, you'll need to reach out to our account specialists by [submitting a ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) This is because account recoveries and management require sensitive information that should not be posted on the boards.
